markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mist Child](/Feats.aspx?ID=1331) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You blend in with unnatural subtlety. When you are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), increase the DC of the flat check to target you to 6 if you're concealed or 12 if you're hidden.
name: Mist Child
